name: React Counter
description:
Create an app that keeps track of a total count. See the final result here: https://mjn50xwm6x.codesandbox.io/

It should:
- display the count
- display a + button
- display a - button
- display a reset button
- increase the count when  + is clicked
- decrease the count when - is clicked
- reset the count when reset is clicked
